H0.text: In 1942, which town was destroyed by Nazis in reprisal for the assassination of Reinhard Heydrick. Terezin

H1.text: In 1942, which town was destroyed by Nazis in reprisal for the assassination of Reinhard Heydrick. Pilsen

H2.text: In 1942, which town was destroyed by Nazis in reprisal for the assassination of Reinhard Heydrick. Kladno

H3.text: In 1942, which town was destroyed by Nazis in reprisal for the assassination of Reinhard Heydrick. Liditz

A4.text: The village was set on fire and the remains of the buildings destroyed with explosives.

A5.text: On 9 June 1942, 172 boys and men between age 14 to 84 were shot.
